title: hi im new
content: Hi, a tutor of mine has introduced this site to the class and I have decided to join, because i think this will be the place where ill get help and critiques for my work. At the moment I'm half way through my 3 year degree graphic design course based in New Zealand, and one day I hope i'll be designing some sort of typefaces.
author: kenz

comments.content:
Hi Kenny,  
Welcome to the magical world of type freaks.  
I myself have not been a member that long, but I find this site is an inspiration!  
Don't be shy and upload some of your designs or sketches...

Jean Paul
